div.p: AS "KILLING JESUS." KIND OF YOU TO SAY THAT.
MERRY CHRISTMAS. THE FACTOR TIP OF THE DAY, MONEY
IS TIGHT. SOMETIMES LITTLE GIFTS MEAN MORE
THAN EXPENSIVE GIFTS. HERE IS A CHRISTMAS GIFT IDEA
YOU MAY WANT TO CONSIDER. WRITE A LETTER TO PEOPLE WHO
HAVE HELPED YOUR LIFE. MAKE IT THREE PARAGRAPHS OR SO,
HANDWRITTEN OF COURSE. TELL US HOW MUCH THEIR KIND NESS
MEANT TO YOU. YOU DON’T HAVE TO GET MUSHY.
END THE LETTER WITH MERRY CHRISTMAS.
BELIEVE ME. IF YOU SEND LETTERS TO PEOPLE
WHO SINCERELY HELPED YOU THAT WILL MEAN MORE THAN MOST
FACTOR TIP OF THE DAY. THAT’S IT FOR US.
CHECK OUT THE FOX NEWS FACTOR WEBSITE WEBZ.
SPOUT OFF ABOUT THE FACTOR FROM ANYWHERE IN THE WORLD.
